properties.Description:
Functional Urban Area (FUA) boundaries, used within the context of Urban Atlas 2012 and 2018 for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service. The dataset contains a total of 788 FUA over EEA38 (with the exception of Liechtenstein) and the United Kingdom.
More information at [https://sdi.eea.europa.eu/catalogue/srv/eng/catalog.search#/metadata/b00ec941-c4dd-4673-91ea-2c8b5145892d](https://sdi.eea.europa.eu/catalogue/srv/eng/catalog.search#/metadata/b00ec941-c4dd-4673-91ea-2c8b5145892d).
providers: © Republic Administration for Geodetic and Property Affairs (Bosnia Herzegovina)
